phrases: I have come from Lieseltania.
My name is Flora.
I am very pleased to meet you all!
Really, you should have at least sent me word that you were coming.
But His Majesty promised me tickets to the Phoenix Festa,
in exchange for not saying a word to you, no matter what!
True to form, he is just a bit too fond of mischief.
And it was my big brother who put you up to wearing that, right?
Yes!
He said if I wore this, you would know me right away!
Seriously...
I do not believe that guy!
But this is what I normally wear, anyway.
A maid's uniform?
But why?
Flora's working as a maid-in-waiting at the palace.
Well, actually she is still just a trainee.
But I never would have guessed!
Corrupt Ruler
That you have been fighting for the sake of an orphanage, Riessfeld-senpai.
I-It is really not all that big a deal.
Hey, I know.
Tell us, Flora...
Yes?
What was Julis like back home?
What is that all of a sudden?!
No, no, I would just like to know, that is all.
What was she like?
She is more or less the same as she is now.
Whenever she was with us, she was so kind and warm-hearted,
and when she was at the palace, she was dashing and cool.
So she is the same as she is now!
Now, then...
Please take a look!
These are my memories of the princess!
You have so many!
There was a nun who wanted to preserve memories as much as possible.
Thanks to her influence, the kids got into the habit of taking pictures, as well.
Flora, what is this?
Oh, that is me getting my hair washed!
Did you see?
Did you see?!
You saw, did not you?!
N-No, I did not!
I did not see anything!
Flora, how many times have I told you to delete that photo?!
But... but... that is one of my precious memories of you, Princess.
Flora, you really adore Julis, do not you?
Yes!
I really look up to Her Highness!
And someday I plan to come here as a student myself!
And then I am going to help everyone in the orphanage, just like her!
Really?
That is impressive!
I told you there is no need for you to do that.
But!
But!
I want to do something to help everybody, too!
You are still just a child.
Do not worry about such things, you should be
I hear the student council president at Jie Long is even younger than me!
So why not me, then?
It will be at least two years before you are old enough to enroll here.
By then, I will have already fulfilled all your wishes.
I told you the last time I saw you, remember?
That I would save you all, no matter what, and change that country myself.
And in order to do that, I am going to win all of the Festas.
Or do you have so little faith in me?
Of course that is not the case!
Fine, then.
That is our Riessfeld.
Your goals are lofty and epic.
But sadly, you are out of luck.
At the very least, we are going to win the Phoenix Festa.
Right, Kirin?
Uh, right!
I-I am not going to lose, either!
Because I have a wish I cannot give up!
Lady Sasamiya and Lady Toudou... you are my princess's rivals, I see!
Rivals?!
Wh-What is it?
You have a point, I guess.
I am home.
Huh?
Yabuki's not back yet?
Your older sister... what about her?
It seems like he is seen another person wielding that same Ogre Lux.
Oh, Mr. Amagiri!
Good evening, Priscilla.
Sorry to call you out of the blue.
Oh, no, that is perfectly fine!
I was thinking that I needed to thank you,
but since the Phoenix Festa is still going on, I did not want to bother you.
But thank you very much for the other day!
Hey, I have not done anything you should thank me for.
You brought my sister back to me, Mr. Amagiri.
I can never thank you enough for that.
Oh, I know!
Would it be all right if I asked you to dinner again
All right, enough!
Just let me talk!
W-Wait a second!
Yo, Amagiri.
Good evening, Irene.
You wanted to talk to me, not Priscilla, right?
No, that is not right, either.
It is not me that you really want to talk to...
It is that bastard Dirk.
Good guess.
No, I am just repeating what I heard that damned Dirk say.
He told me that you would be calling me sooner or later,
wanting to get in touch with him.
Then could you give him a message from me?
Tell him that I want to ask him about Haruka Amagiri,
so I would like to meet up.
Sure thing.
All part of my job, after all.
I owe you one.
Thanks.
But you would better watch your back.
We are not the only ones he is got at his beck and call.
Rumor has it that Erenshkigal herself works for him, too.
Erenshkigal?
And also...
He is got Grimalkin in his clutches as well.
Grimalkin?
That is Rewolf's intelligence organization.
Those guys are seriously hard core.
Just give them the order,
and they will do any kind of dirty work without a second thought.
Gotcha.
I will be vigilant, then.
You do that.
There is no point unless you still have your life.
By the way, I saw your match today.
Man, you were toiling!
No thanks to you!
Serves you right!
E-Excuse me, Amagiri!
Would you mind waiting for a second?
Hey!
Hey, what is the big idea?
You are going to thank him properly, remember?
You do not have to tell me!
A-Amagiri...
Something wrong?
No...
Uh, let us see.
I just thought I should thank you myself, see?
But do not read too much into it!
Thank me?
You know, for that thing.
The Gravi-Sheath thing.
Not that I want to admit it...
but since you busted it, I am barely earning anything, and it is awful...
Well, if it was not for you, the fact is, I would be a goner.
Oh, is that what you are talking about?
You saved me.
Thanks, man.
Now the ball's in the Tyrant's court, huh?
Sister...
I am home!
Man, I have not been home in ages!
Yabuki?
Hey, my bad.
Did I wake you?
No, that is okay.
Anyway, long time no see, huh?
Well, the Phoenix Festa is a profitable time for me, you know.
Oh, hey, by the way, I saw your match yesterday.
So now you are into the quarterfinals.
Congrats!
DELICIOUS TEA
Though it did feel like a hollow victory.
Oh, well, you still managed to win, so it is all good!
So who are your next opponents, the Jie Long twins?
Those two are going to be a handful.
I mean, their personalities could not be worse.
Thanks.
I have seen their match data,
but it sure seems like they have a knack for hitting you where it hurts.
Those two really know how to take advantage of Star Senjutsu, after all.
I bet their opponents just hate going up against them!
Take advantage of Star Senjutsu?
Oh, that is right, you have never gone up against Taoists, right?
JIE LONG
Well, the short answer is
that Star Senjutsu takes the power of a Strega or a Dante
and generalizes it as a technique, I guess.
It is more common to see Stregas and Dantes use distinctive powers,
but then they lose stability, and it is easier to mount a counter-attack.
But Taoists have no such vulnerabilities.
Is that right?
Thanks.
Thank goodness.
So you are awake?
Yeah.
What is up?
Actually...
Flora insists on inviting you to lunch.
Apparently there is something she just has to ask you.
Flora?
Needless to say, as long as you do not mind...
No, that is totally fine with me.
Really?
Then if you do not mind, can you come out to the Business District?
The thing is, it is horribly crowded along Main Street.
We should probably meet up somewhere else.
Hey, what is this?
Looking for a place to eat?
Then I will be happy to recommend a place.
This is a date, right?
D-Date?
Y-You moron!
Do not get the wrong idea!
Flora's the one who has some business with Ayato,
Okay...
and it is not like I want to see him...
See?
Here it is.
Hey, listen to me!
Not a lot of tourists,
and the atmosphere and the food are not bad.
A well-kept secret...
A stylish hidden cafe in a quiet neighborhood Rice omelet and parfait are recommended!
I am impressed that you knew this place.
What do you think, Julis?
Want to meet up here?
I guess so.
Although it is annoying that it was Yabuki who recommended it...
All right, then that is settled.
Let us meet up in two hours.
Okay.
Thanks,
Yabuki.
I owe you one.
Hey, not a problem.
Because after all, having you owe me one is sure to come in handy sometime.
I will just have to pray that it does not cost me too much!
That was so delicious!
Oh...
Really, now...
Look, there is ketchup all over your face.
Okay, got it.
Thank you very much!
Well, but the atmosphere and the food are quite good here.
I hate to admit it, but Yabuki gave us good information.
Tell that to him yourself.
He will be thrilled.
I will do no such thing!
I have come to grief many times, thanks to him!
He is got a long way to go to offset that!
So... what is it you wanted to ask me, Flora?
R-Right!
Hold on a second, please!
Let us see...
Thank you for waiting!
Here is your jumbo parfait!
What, do you want one of those, too?
Yes.
Here is your jumbo parfait!
What are you staring at?
It is delicious!
Uh, nothing.
I was just thinking that you are surprisingly soft on kids.
Well, I cannot help it.
Since it is not often that these kids get the chance to be spoiled.
And besides, at the orphanage they rarely get to have such sweets.
Once in a while should not hurt, right?
But you know what?
Since you have been sending us money, it is been a lot easier.
The nuns said so.
You are sending them money?
I-It is no big deal, really.
It is my bonus money for being a Page One.
And it is not like there is anything I could spend it on here.
Your Highness!
Your Highness!
What is up?
Open up and say ah, Your Highness!
I see.
Yes, this is quite tasty.
Yes!
I feel like my tongue's going to melt!
Oh, that is right!
While I am at it, let me offer you some, too, Mr. Amagiri!
You mean I can have some, too?
Of course!
The princess and the nuns always say
that good food tastes even better when you share it!
Right, Your Highness?
W-Well, th-that is certainly true, but...
B-But you see, that spoon...
I myself just...
Okay, here you go!
Say ah, Mr. Amagiri!
You are right!
This really tastes great, huh?
Yes!
Thank you, Flora.
Uh... Julis, is something wrong?
Huh!
It is nothing!
Anyway, Flora, what about those questions you wanted to ask?
Let us get this done and over with!
Okay!
Seriously...
Now we are finally getting down to business.
Um...
What was the first thing?
Oh, here it is!
All right, here is my first question.
Um, how far have you gone in your relationship with the princess?
Wh-What kind of question is that?!
That question... you did not think it up yourself, did you?
Nope!
His Highness told me to investigate the boy
who might become his younger brother in the future!
Curse you, Brother!
I am confiscating this!
You cannot do that!
This is a job I was entrusted with!
Please let me see it through to the end!
Denied!
Uh, excuse me...
Sorry to bother you when you are busy.
Could I speak to you for a minute?
Um...
You are Ayato Amagiri, right?
That is me.
Sorry to bother you, but I wonder if you could come with me?
Pardon me!
I still have not introduced myself.
I am the secretary to the student council president at Rewolf.
My name is Korona Kashimaru!
And, you see...
the president awaits you.
President, did you say?
What does the Tyrant want with my partner?
Hey, hold up, Julis.
Actually, I am the one who asked for this meeting.
What is that?
What are you talking about?
I will explain later.
Julis and Flora, you wait here, okay?
Wait.
I am coming with you to this meeting.
We are partners, are not we?
What?
B-But it is just Mr. Amagiri that the president wishes
Is there a problem?
That is fine with me.
Bring them over, Korona.
I might as well take this opportunity to see the Gluhen Rose in person.
V-Very well, understood!
Flora, I am sorry, but there it is.
You can get back to the hotel on your own, right?
Yes!
I will be fine!
This way, please.
Get in.
So you are Murakumo, huh?
You sure look absentminded.
If someone like you is their Rank 1, Seidoukan's nothing special.
I wonder who it was that gave the order
to destroy such an absentminded opponent...
Tyrant?
I do not know what you are talking about.
You bastard, you have got a lot of nerve!
The other day, I heard Irene Urzaiz say it!
- That you...
Ayato! - Julis, it is no use.
Irene only told us because it was a one-time thing.
We do not have any proof.
But still!
And besides, we have to let it go,
or we will only make trouble for her.
I see your wits, at least, are reasonably quick.
Well, that has nothing to do with what I want to ask you.
That is right.
But before we start talking, let me warn you.
I am not obligated to answer your questions.
Just be sure to keep that in mind.
But...
If that is the case, why are you here?
I do not know... let us just call it a whim.
A busy student council president like you is acting on a whim?
No way.
There is something I can provide you with, too.
Am I right?
That is right.
If you want something,
you have to offer something yourself, or no deals can be made.
Fine, you pass.
What did you want to ask me?
My sister... Haruka Amagiri.
Everything you know about her.
Unfortunately, it is not as if I know all that much about her.
I have only ever seen her once.
Where?
The Eclipse Festa.
Do you know about it, Julis?
Well, yes.
It was created by scumbags dissatisfied with the Festas,
who wanted something more violent and stimulating.
An illegal battle game with no rules.
No rules...
The matches are decided when one of the players either loses consciousness...
or else...
loses his or her life.
Apparently it had a fervent following among some wealthy patrons,
and it thrived.
However, it is been...
That is right, they did away with the Eclipse Festa years ago.
Because the captain of the Guard really could not stand it.
When I saw Haruka Amagiri, it was as a contestant of that Festa.
You are saying... that my sister took part in it?
Yeah.
I remember it well because she was using the damned Ser=Versta.
And... how did that match end?
Haruka Amagiri lost.
Hey, Ayato.
Are you all right?
Uh, yeah...
Sure.
Well, I hear that she did not actually die.
Not that I know what became of her afterward.
That is the one and only time I ever saw Haruka Amagiri.
Is that... right?
All right, now it is my turn to ask you a question.
Look, you... what is Madiath Mesa to you?
Madiath Mesa...
You mean the Chairman of the Festa Steering Committee?
Does not look like you are playing dumb there.
Fine, then.
We are done talking.
Now get out of my sight.
Hold up!
There is just one thing I cannot figure out.
Just how did you find out where we were?
We only decided to go to that cafe only a few hours ago.
I could understand if we would made a reservation,
but on such short notice, how...
Idiot.
I am under no obligation to answer that.
Uh, come to think of it,
when I went to pick up Mr. Amagiri and Ms. Riessfeld,
there was an adorable little girl with them.
Really, she looked just like a doll.
I wonder who she was?
What did you say?
She is not listed in the data you gave me.
But she is still quite small,
and she was not wearing a school emblem,
so I do not think she is an Asterisk student.
Oh, one more thing!
She even had on a maid's uniform, that little girl!
Can you believe it?
A maid?
It really became her!
She was adorable!
Tell me more about her.
Oh, my...
Now then...
T-Time for guard duty!
It is the true heroine's time to shine!
Episode 15 Breaking the Memory Barrier
Oh, no, of course I was not sleeping!
This is my hour, so there will be plenty of...
